Thank you for the reply, I did submit a ticket however my username is still being deemed as innappropriate even though it really isn't. Using the three letter F word would be inappropriate, "Gay" is not.

@Porocles @riot

my pbe account was made inactive because of my username "Gay" which is not offensive at all seeing as I am gay myself. This is some grade-a bullshit, unfair and borderline discrimination. I've never had an issue in-game with anyone saying my name was offensive or even bullying me because of it and we all know how toxic this community is.

Teeeechnically it's not. Someone probably reported your name as offensive, and believe it or not "gay" can be an offensive term. You can probably contest it, change your name and whatnot, but keep in mind you don't see people with the name "%%%%%" and contest it on the grounds they are black.
Katey probably can't personally help you with your issue. What's the problem?
